whole log

I got the same problem on both Linux and WinXP.

- use the metadata generator to generate metadata for the SDK + delta pack and the releng tools feature, both M3 and the M4 candidate versions.
- download and run the agent.zip (20071211-0954)
- create profile and install SDK M3
- start SDK
- exit SDK
- in the Agent UI, find updates to the SDK and install the M4 version
- try and run the provisioned M4 version

Here is the first entry in the log, with the whole log attached.

It is true that the preference bundle is no longer in my bundles.txt file. (it is in the plugins directory though)

The version of the bundle didn't change between M3 and M4 so the same version would be in both.
This might be a problem with my metadata generation. I will try again.

Still a problem with re-generated metadata. Note that the bundle is in the
plug-ins directory but the entry is not in the bundles.txt file.

It seems that any bundle which didn't change between versions, is not included
in the bundles.txt. I started adding them to the bundles.txt manually just to
see how many there are, but stopped after:

preferences
content type
icu
junit4
ant.core
ui.views
core.variables
ide.application
...

I will investigate.
*** Bug 212809 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Pascal has released a fix to HEAD in SimpleConfiguratorManipulatorImpl.
*** Bug 210593 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
This works for me now.  Thanks.
